website_summaries.verdict: Choose this BP monitor if the high morning average function will help you assess your health needs. Otherwise, check out less pricey models on our list.
pros: Has high morning indicator that alerts users of potentially concerning high morning BP averages
cons: Compatible with the Omron app, but some owners had problems connecting to it

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy Issue
customer_reviews.text: Cardiologist’s office confirmed the monitor was10-15 points high on the diastolic measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Unit is Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the accuracy is it always tested higher at home. I took the unit to the doctors and it always read 20 points higher than theirs. So calling the company I would have to return it and pay for the postage. Return to Amazon no problem
customer_reviews.author: pbarreca

customer_reviews.title: Reads ~20% HIGH at home compared to Physicians Office
customer_reviews.text: Nice device BUT with terrible accuracy. Requested a replacement as I would like to continue using the product. Noticed all my BP measurements (several per day, over a week) were way too HIGH for me. Physician office reading = 132/86 vs. 158/96 at home after 30-minutes on OMRON unit. Typically an at-home reading is lower than in the Drs office.
customer_reviews.author: adolfo b.

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied. Consistently shows 20pts higher is systolic and 10-15 higher on diastolic. I compared to the doctor's machine twice. Contacted the manufacturer, paid to ship it back only to have it returned with a letter saying it tested within parameters. If I use the readings from this machine, my meds would have to be I increased and per the doctors readings, I should lower the ones I'm already on. I can no longer return it since sending it back for review put me past the return date. I eont buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. I purchased this brand based on a recommendation from my doctor and she said that it's very accurate. Unfortunately this is not true. It doesn't account for a larger persons blood pressure correctly. My wrist cuff matches the doctors office measurement while this one consistently is 20-30 points higher. I do not recommend this. It will cause fear and panic when you first take your pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Tried for 3 days but still does not work. Settings come and go. Can’t enable monitor Bluetooth. Directions on app are different from written instructions included in box. Setup is confusing and only partially functions. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: vggcm

customer_reviews.title: Very inaccurate.
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure monitor was taking readings that were all over the place so I set a blood pressure check appointment with my Dr's nurse. The nurse took my blood pressure using the stethoscope method two times. I took my my blood pressure two times using the OMRON Platinum blood pressure monitor, she confirmed I was using it correctly and the OMRON monitors readings were much higher than her results. I'm returning the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Clay R Burton

customer_reviews.title: Solid unit!
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very good quality. I purchased the unit with the intent of capturing the data on the app. After I was able to connect with Bluetooth, it has worked very well. I highly recommend this unit. Note: The button used to connect to bluetooth is on the back of the unit, which is not intuitive and is not stated in the app instructions. I looked at the bluetooth section of the manual and it was not clear. I ultimately had to call support. They were very helpful and I was connected in seconds after the rep told me where to find the button. Suggestion to Omron - revise the app instructions and bluetooth section of the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Ahoey

customer_reviews.title: Platinum for the win!
customer_reviews.text: It works very well. I’ve been tracking my blood pressure in my iPhone for years prior to buying this device. It is very accurate and can be used independently of the smart features, or concurrently with them. It’s a win win device. Very happy with my purchase. Oh, and if you’re comparing models... the Silver, Gold, and Platinum are similar to the 5,7,10 models. The “metal” models are amazon specific and have a carrying case. Also, for whatever reason, the 10 series I bought before this Platinum would not connect. I returned it and bought this platinum model (the same thing according to OMRON”, yet it worked immediately and came with the case. Buy the Platinum and never look back.
customer_reviews.author: M&ROlsen

customer_reviews.title: If you need to export your data, this is NOT the device you need.
customer_reviews.text: so, I bought this, thinking I was going to be able to export my data, but it turns out, the device BP5450 doesn't appear on the list, tried different countries with configurations but got no result :*(. feeling completely pissed with this device and the app. A completely pain and waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Londono Sal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have had other BP monitors, but wanted another one with Bluetooth capabilities. Although another less expensive brand monitor I bought didn't give me accurate readings, I decided to buy a known brand, a little more expensive, but sure worth it. This monitor takes three readings and averages them each time, and will tell you if it detects an irregular heartbeat among other features. If the power goes out or it gets accidentally unplugged without batteries being installed, it doesn't lose the memory. I can't say enough good things about this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Omron selling lemon.
customer_reviews.text: Product came useless, with the E1 error, all accessories installed correctly and still no work.
customer_reviews.author: Danilo Alejandro Santos Frias

customer_reviews.title: Do Not use App - Alive Corp is taking advantage of Omron customers
customer_reviews.text: Even for Platinum level products the graphing / report sending function of App turns off after 30 days and you are asked to pay $99/year or $9.99/month to use. I called Omron and they copped out and said it was Alive corps issue (a 3rd party vendor). They are nickeling and diming for basic functions to even platinum customers. These are a few things that are useful when communicating with doctor. A reputed company like Omron should be upfront about it or include in the product and app. Further, take ownership of the full experience vs sending you over to another 3rd party.
customer_reviews.author: Sahara C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality with Integration
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a different brand a while back and have never been satisfied with it. So we went back to our Omron brand since we have had a wrist Omron for years. This meter is bluetooth ready and their APP works great in keeping your recordings for your doctor to see. We purchased the Platinum at a little more cost and the readout is large and the cuff is much easier to use then our other brand. The TruRead technology is something we have not used in the past but have since getting this meter. The integration with the APP keeps us on track with reminders when to take our BP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought his blood pressure had skyrocketed. At the doctor's office today, the nurse took his blood pressure and then she immediately took it twice with the Omron Platinum that we bought last spring. The top number was off by 35 and 27 points. The bottom number was off by 28 and 24. We will no longer be using it and I sure wish I'd done this before it was too late to return it. I had a strong feeling that it was inaccurate even before finding out for sure today.
customer_reviews.author: B. Raker

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: The unit showed high blood pressure constantly to the point I had to go to my doctors. Once there, the doctor took a reading using their equipment and I had perfect BP when the Omron unit showed very high numbers. I called in to the call center number provided and they asked a lot of questions to try to show I was doing it wrong. The doctor used it in her office and Omrons numbers were still way high. The call center rep was no help and how I have to ship it to them at my own cost to have them test it. Lets see what happens. I don't recommend this at all. Try a different brand and company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Enough
customer_reviews.text: My old meter did not provide a close reading and so I upgraded to a more expensive machine. It was tested in my doctor's office with two other machines and the old fashion one. The readings were only off by a few points (less than five on both scales). I am a senior and this is quite good for what I need. I would recommend this for seniors who can afford the higher costs. This machine has a great memory which is helpful because it tracks date and time. So, if one needed to compile a chart it would be easy to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Drake M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Rating is based on what I did not get
customer_reviews.text: The AC Adapter is not a US plug. Going to return this as their Customer Service is closed. This is ridiculous, I have been on hold with Omron's Customer Service for 20 mins. I can't imagine anyone wanting to buy this if this an indication of the type of service you are going to get.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate as tested by my cardiologist
customer_reviews.text: The unit consistently read 10-20 points high on both the systolic and diastolic pressure readings. I could not believe that my pressure was so much higher than it normally is. I confirmed the inaccurate readings at my cardiologist's office comparing to their professional blood pressure monitor. Amazon sent a replacement unit, but it was equally inaccurate with very high readings. Once again, took it to my cardiologist's office for verification. This is supposed to be one of Omron's most accurate and sophisticated models. I returned it. Not worth anything with the inaccurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: djr21orl

customer_reviews.title: Accurate blood pressure readings.
customer_reviews.text: As a registered nurse it was important that the blood pressure readings were accurate as many automatic cuffs are not compared to manual blood pressure cuffs. On several occasions I have double checked my husband’s blood pressure with a manual cuff and variation in readings were negligible.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist recommended I take regular blood pressure readings since my pressure tends to fluctuate quite a bit. My upper arm is rather large so I needed a cuff that would work for me. I'd like it to be a bit - maybe an inch - larger, but it works. I don't know how accurate it is (hence the 4 stars) since I haven't been back to the doctor to compare readings. It does store quite a few readings and the option of taking three reading in succession to provide an average is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: nawlenslady

customer_reviews.title: Reproducible
customer_reviews.text: The best machine that I have tried for accuracy and consistency. The battery life is great. The cuff fit is excellent when compared to other units that I have tried. This product also has the appearance of durability. I am in the health field and I am familiar with taking blood pressures. I am using this for my personal use and find it as good as it gets. My wife is a nurse and also finds it to be reasonably accurate. I normally use a large cuff and my wife uses a normal cuff. It works well for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: P J

customer_reviews.title: The best home meter
customer_reviews.text: I've used many home BP meters and this Omron is the best - period. It's accurate. Easy to set up. Comes with readable instructions. I'm very impressed. With all the junk products on the market today just do yourself a favor and choose the best - first. Grandma knows best.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Requires Bluetooth connection and app, or else major features are unavailable.
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed. I have an older Omron, thought I'd stick with the brand. But this one requires Bluetooth set up +the downloading of an App to my phone to perform basic functions like using memory averages, setting time and date, and TrueRead mode. I do not want to use an app connection; I wouldn't have purchased if I knew that. It works in a very basic BP reader with no Bluetooth and app, but I don't think it is worth the price with all the features unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: RWS

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This product has to be continually paired in Bluetooth to send data to you phone. More importantly I had an issue with my screen as it has marks inside the screen. I was told to send back at my cost after repeated emails and calls, I got my original unit back and told nothing was wrong. I would not buy another Omron product again. I got the Platinum version thinking there be no defects. So not only am I out the money to return, the time to return and get back, Omron refused to fix or replace. Do not buy even though unit seems to work well. Do not waste money on companies that do not honor a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Goldfinger

customer_reviews.title: Finally, an  Accurate Machine
customer_reviews.text: I have tried FIVE different blood pressure machines and this one works. It is pricey, but a cheap inaccurate machine is worthless. I love how easy it is to read and how it syncs to my phone for data. It is even easy for my husband to use as the buttons are large and obvious. So far, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Bessyrose

customer_reviews.title: Highly inaccurate - can't trust this device
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting extremely high readings. I have this set to take my BP 3 times in about 3 minutes and average the results. Constantly read over 140+ over 94+ Finally took it to my doctor's office when I had a normal checkup and their BP results were 118 / 83 Can't use this as intended due to poor quality / results Can't return now and Omron makes you pay to ship it back. Was told they don't calibrate, they just replace (and likely with another inaccurate BP reader)
customer_reviews.author: Laserdogg

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement for an old one
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is easy to use and read the results. The cuff goes on easily and stays together during the test. My old one we had to hold the cuff in place which I think might have thrown off the accuracy. The read-out on the screen is large and light enough to be easily and the memory lets me look back at my testing to see how I'm maintaining my blood pressure. My doctor always asks if I have taken my pressure anywhere other than his office , now I can give him other readings. Great quality and the price was reasonable
customer_reviews.author: chut

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the model it replaces (BP786N)
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the new cuff. The cuff on the BP786N could easily be applied with one hand. the new cuff is hard to do on your own. You really want a third hand! Also, I found it is significantly cheaper to buy directly from the Omron web site. In general, the pairing process is a bit convoluted. Other things pair easier. I rated the BP786N 5 stars. Too bad it is discontinued. There are still places that have that in stock but they want a small fortune for it. Now I know why!
customer_reviews.author: Bertilak

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult time Syncing
customer_reviews.text: Like most people I’ve paired dozens of Bluetooth devices over the years. This BP machine took me 2 days to figure out. I removed an original app after many attempts to pair device and downloaded app again. On all attempts I would get “No device found”. Funny thing it found the actual series of this model but wouldn’t sync. So on second day I attempted to pair and it wouldn’t. I went to find box for return and attempted once more and Wa-La... it finally Synched. I have no idea what clicked on last attempted. Monitor functions fine just bad pairing.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace the one I have had for many years and found this one to be the most comparable. I am very happy with it so far and am glad that I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M L

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 95 yr old mother, the doctor wanted her to monitor her BP between visits and if her average for a week period was at a certain level he would want to see her. Had purchased a different one , had to write done your readings , of course papers were getting lost, this solved the problem she can take a evening reading and a morning reading( does them as two different people so she has her evening and morning averages) and they are stored on the monitor. It arrived never heard from her she was able to use the monitor with out help, which made her very happy, Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate. About 20 points difference over 6 consecutive readings
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device based on cnet review of best blood pressure monitor. I am very disappointed because Omron is a well known brand. When I first used it, I notice the readings are so much higher than of my doctor's. I even called my doctor and asked for higher dose (twice as much as my current dose). And he did. Before I took a new dose, I wanted to make sure and took 6 consecutive readings to confirm that the monitor is reading accurately. To my dismay, the readings are 20 points different: the 6th reading is 20 points lower than the 1st reading. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Software & documentation could be better
customer_reviews.text: Doctor request. The hardware product works fine. The smart Android application needs better documentation. Had to call support for some adjustments, they admit that documentation missing info on some defaults the user may want to change to avoid some conflicts due to poor programming. Software looks to be a Beta release not a final product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete tech won't work with new phones. Useless for the technology I wanted to take advantage of.
customer_reviews.text: I have a LG G8, less than. 1 year old....and according to the support website, this monitor doesn't work with stuff newer than LG G5....why the hell was this monitor advertised as the latest NEW model, if it doesnt work with MODERN phones? I wanted the easy feature of logging my readings and taking them to my Dr. On my phone. This omron monitor doesn't show up on my Bluetooth devices when trying to pair. When using the Omron Connect app it says it can't locate the monitor. So I presume I'm also SOL with other apps because my new phone simply can't detect this "latest and greatest" model from Omron....so mad.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. It's supposed to pair with a smartphone, but it won't go into pairing mode, so my phone can't find the device. Thirty minutes of that and throwing it out the window came to mind. So, I skipped the app, and it does not match the reading done manually with a cuff. It's off by 20 points (too high). It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Linda V

customer_reviews.title: Great BP Monitor & 5⭐
customer_reviews.text: Brand recommend by our DR. Very pleased with unit Easy to use with large readout. AC adapter eminates the need for AA batteries, but could use battery when traveling. Idea unit! RIT (Rule if Thumb) Never go cheap on auto tires, brakes it medical equipment. Live Well!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Look for a product where everything works
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat happy with the cuff unit. But it is an arduous process to get the app to pair with the cuff unit. An when you do it will drop the pairing. The try pairing again and you get a duplicate cuff unit. So then delete both and several hours later you may get the cuff unit and App paired. So if you buy this you'll get a decent blood pressure cuff unit to get your blood pressure, but don't expect to be able to easily archive the results. What a shame!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Guillaume

customer_reviews.title: Less than Accurate - Tech Support No Help
customer_reviews.text: Readings were way off those observed by Health Care professionals. Called Tech Support, they didn't care. Returned, thank goodnesses for Amazon return policy.
customer_reviews.author: LaundryNumber 36

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't rate this product. It seems fine. I had purchased it hoping it would perform better than my older Omron cuff. I was having high blood pressure and really wanted accuracy. I tried it 3 or 4 times at the same time I used the old cuff and found them to be identical. I'm fairly convinced that occasionally these cuffs just aren't accurate. Which is fine if you want it to be "close" but if you want true accuracy, I believe you have to go with a much more expensive model.
customer_reviews.author: clw

customer_reviews.title: The product has been used, it is not new.
customer_reviews.text: I received my order today. This is not a new product. The cuff has stains on it and it has clearly been used before. I want a new replacement as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MEDIOCRE AT BEST. NO BETTER THAN MANUL.
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok BP measurement device, upper arm cuff. I don't have an easy way to calibrate it. So I am accepting the manufacturers manufacturer's assurances. The bluetooth pairs ok with my Galaxy note 9. But the data do not transfer using the app. So all the additional cost gave me is more trouble. The web site promises a chat, but it isn't working. Mediocre at best. Support pages are useless product ads.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Too inaccurate to be trusted.
customer_reviews.text: This is so inaccurate that I began to panic at the high readings I was getting. I was so worried that I went to the urgent care for my doctor to get checked out. Took the monitor with me. They checked my blood pressure immediately, and it read a 138/68 (within normal parameters). They then took my BP with the Omron and it read 187/97. Double checked with their equipment and the Omron again. Still 136/70 for the hospital check vs. 171/92 for the Omron. This device is USELESS. My previous Omron was way more accurate than this piece of junk. And of course, it’s past the return date. Never again Omron.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Just does not work
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I really need one of these. Unfortunately i can't figure out how to get into its menu. All errer messages. Will not pair with any of my 4 apple devices (the list of items it pairs with is very dated. If you own a newer apple device stay away from this. Not sure if even the Omron equivalent to this in the 10 series would pair. Pretty sad for a leader in technology.
customer_reviews.author: Mike from Houston

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing about a BP cuff is its accuracy. I bought this BP cuff back in April 2020 and today I had the opportunity to take it to my doctor's office to check its accuracy. I had concerns because it was regularly showing a higher reading than my 30 year old cuff. Well today I had my BO taken at the doctor's office and it was 124/82. So I had the nurse take my BP with my Omron BP cuff. Wow- it read 182/107! I will now use my BF cuff I got 30 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Mark

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, some features lacking
customer_reviews.text: Most importantly, readings matched well with a regular BP cuff at my PCP's office. It's a little onerous, but I like being able to bluetooth the data out to my cell. I then email it to myself so I can port it to my spreadsheet that I can then share both tabular and graphic data with my doctor. In the negative, I do wish there was a dedicated on/off button to easily check old readings. Also, the app needs some work - you can't read all information because items overlay one another.
customer_reviews.author: Grazz

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I decided to spend a bit more money in hopes that I would get a monitor that was more likely to be accurate. This unit consistently reads the diastolic (bottom number) 10-15+ points higher than the accurate manual reading. It's possible that I just got a defective unit. It is super easy to use. I am disappointed I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexipooh

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy OMRON
customer_reviews.text: First unit, high readings, as verified by the nurse for my primary care physician. Returned. Second unit, high readings, as verified by the nurse for my primary care physician. Worked with OMRON technician on the phone. High readings. Tech said to send unit to OMRON facility to be calibrated. OMRON had the unit for SIX WEEKS. Got it back yesterday. High readings, as verified by the nurse for my primary care physician. Presently on Amazon website trying to see if I can still return unit for refund. If I could rate this product at less than zero, I would.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Koukal

customer_reviews.title: Very comprehensive instrument.
customer_reviews.text: The machine has all the bells and whistles and performs well, is easy to use once you read the 59 page instruction manual. It has more features than I need or will use, especially the Bluetooth feature and the weekly averaging. If I had a do-over I would order another more basic model which I'm sure would preform as well since I have had Omron in the past and they last a long time. I like the option of 3 reading averaging and 2 user capability with reading storage available. Also, the material sent said it had a six year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: All readings are high false irregualr heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this bp monitor but its readings are continually higher than when at Drs office or at cardiac rehab. Not even close. then this weekend it started telling me I had an irregular heartbeat, four 3x readings two days in a row. I am monitered for rehab and they have not had any indications about irregular heartbeats. Very unreliable. Who would you trust this monitor or the healthcare proffessionals?
customer_reviews.author: Mike E

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and read
customer_reviews.text: I would say this product is easy to use but the readings can be a little erratic if you're not using IntelliSense. The monitor does link with Samsung health although it's not listed as one of the compatible models and it does display the correct readings from the monitor so if that's an issue for you, rest assured because it does work. The only real issue I have with it right now is the second user readings also go to my app so I'm getting both readings and have to remove those that were not mine in the app. I'm sure this is just user error but could be a bigger issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Meyer

customer_reviews.title: If you have low or irregular heart rate this machine is not for you
customer_reviews.text: I bought my machine and could not get it to take a reading. I called support and if it detects an irregular heart beat three times it will not give you a reading, if your heart rate is under 40 it will not give you a reading. I have long been aware of my low heart rate, there is no notice in the information when purchasing that it would be an issue. I called support and it was pretty much "oh well" from them. I'm aware of my heart situation, I just wanted to take my blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Amys

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate and some functions do not work
customer_reviews.text: Very inaccurate. Five readings within 15 minutes were so different that I don’t trust any of them. The unit would not pair to my iPhone via the OMRON app. TrueRead mode did not work at all. Memory worked for only a few readings. I probably will return this and select a monitor that is more accurate and easier to program. Definitely not worth the price. This is monitor has a lot of fancy functions that are worthless because the monitor doesn’t perform its basic function—taking an accurate blood pressure!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and like features
customer_reviews.text: Really like this monitor. I have brought it with me doctors’ appointments to compare it to their measurements. It was spot on. I like the option to take 3 pressures for one, most accurate, result. And to have them sent to the app to take to appointments was also very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Greg's wife

customer_reviews.title: Item is simple and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Seller provided a well wrapped (multiple layers of bubble wrap taped to protect manufacturer's box) package. Problem - manufacturer's box had two large jagged holes that were obviously present prior to wrapping. Purchase was supposed to be "New in the box". It is unknown if that is true based on the condition of how the item was packaged. Problem - Amazon web site does not allow feedback on this particular seller.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyFanOne

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Accuracy was one of my key reasons for buying this highly rated product from a leading company. But it is not consistent on repeated readings taken at 5 minutes intervals and not accurate when compared to classical mercury based meter . I was confused on readings varying by 10-15 points on my BP .
customer_reviews.author: Harish G.

customer_reviews.title: Came with European AC adapter, not US AC adapter.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on a Saturday. OMRON customer support closed on weekends. Amazon's Platinum model not listed on OMRON website except in a press release (it is NOT identical to the Series 10). US AC adapter available for sale from OMRON for $19.99. Returned to Amazon unused.
customer_reviews.author: Rich(ard) in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy counts!
customer_reviews.text: Took this to my physicians office to compare for accuracy which is critical for this type of item. It was very accurate. It’s easy to use and enables me to keep close eye on my blood pressure. The price on this one was great. It was about $10 cheaper than my pharmacy and a better model. I don’t choose to use the Bluetooth because it requires too much personal information which I’m not comfortable with. That doesn’t detract from the quality of the device...just a personal choice not to use the app.
customer_reviews.author: nancy13

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a 12 year old OMRON product. Same good quality and even better ease of use. And a lot less costly!
customer_reviews.author: R. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: I feel like throwing this out the window!
customer_reviews.text: Why does this not work? I do everything the way they say to, and sometimes it reads but more often than not I get the dreaded E5 reading for no reason! I am furious! I have no clue how to return this thing and I needed it to monitor my BP as I am new to this world of hypertension. I also don't trust the readings. It wasn't cheap either!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Bad readings!!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new unit. I have an older version. Readings on the new unit were very high. Took unit into Dr. office for side to side comparisons. New Omron unit was way off. I called Omron today. They gave me the run around. Wanted me to pay for sending it back for "evaluation". Won't send a new unit. My old unit is giving me accurate readings. No customer service. No accuracy with this new unit. Don't buy this piece of crap. Mine is going in the trash. I've had it less than 2 months! I'm not paying to send it back. No more Omron for me. Interesting, spell check just tried to make Omron "Moron". How fitting!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I really should have accepted the negative reviews. This meter does consistently report 10mmHg high compared to a manual cuff. The Bluetooth connectivity to an iPhone6s was unreliable and when you un-pair you lose your stored readings. The bp reporting is minimal without subscribing to a paid service and is not at all consistent with a "Platinum" device. Fortunately, Amazon permits it to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Y. Pocock

customer_reviews.title: Caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.text: I used his item and returned it after 2 weeks! It’s not accurate and it hurts my arm so bad that I can’t breathe!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Omron one of the best Blood Pressure monitors around
customer_reviews.text: I have owned my one Omron for almost 4 years. Unfortunately due to weight lose and shoulder arm injury it doesn't fit right. (I had the comfy cuff). So I bought this one with the d duff and it fits better because of the way my are is now shaped. It is Blue tooth and with the app my readings can be sent to the doctors office. And with the app I can do a lot of other personal things.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Junk
customer_reviews.text: As everyone is stating 20+ off on sys/dya. Bluetooth is awful and unreliable. This product really has no value. Saw my doctor was 119/80 from both their automated machine and his manual check, OMRON 30 minutes later showed 149/83.
customer_reviews.author: Cory in ATL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work Right
customer_reviews.text: My cardiologist tried it, said it wasn't accurate and needed to be fixed or replaced, Called Omron about sending the 3 month old unit in under warranty, after wasting a fair amount of time with "Customer Service", I finally told her thanks anyway "I'll just throw the damn thing away and forget it" then hung up. So I tossed it and I'll never buy anything from Omron again.
customer_reviews.author: aviator

customer_reviews.title: This device is not giving a correct reading.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that I was getting readings that are way off so i took it to my doctor's office and they did a comparison with theirs. This device is definitely giving very inaccurate readings. I have missed the deadline for returning it. Could the seller exchange this bad one for a new one? Or is there a way I can calibrate it to correctly read my blood pressure?
customer_reviews.author: gbk

customer_reviews.title: Awful app. Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I am excellent with digital and tech Dash but I found this app nearly impossible to use. I actually deleted it and don’t use it anymore. And when the app of this allegedly premium unit doesn’t work well, it makes you wonder how well or accurate the unit itself works.
customer_reviews.author: Knewsman

customer_reviews.title: Never gives a reading that I can trust
customer_reviews.text: Ive gone thru the manual, and I still get completely different readings every time I try it. I was told to get this style to get more accurate BP reading but its basically the same as the cuffs that are out there. DONT BOTHER BUYING THIS AS IT IS A WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: Douged out

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay connected to apps
customer_reviews.text: The monitor was not easy to set up/connect to the OmronConnect app on my iPhone. Once connected, it doesn't stay connected. And it will not automatically transfer date from the monitor to the app.
customer_reviews.author: Ingo46

customer_reviews.title: Okay device horrible app!
customer_reviews.text: The device is just okay. Nothing surprising! The app is absolute garbage! Connecting to app is a hit or miss and thus hard to keep track of your history. The app doesn’t work well with the device ! Also the result is always different even in same day and not very accurate! My advice is just get your blood pressure check at doctors office or free at the clinics and don’t buy these
customer_reviews.author: Thinley

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate and App is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Unit seems cheap build quality, measurement is not accurate and vary too much in successive 3 measurements. And the app is terrible. You have to initiate transfer every time you measure. Turn off device, then turn on by pressing bluetooth button. Then open the app and some clicks there. The, App doesn't transfer data. I measured total 6 times over two days. But, app has only one entry and it is not transferring new data. Either it doesn't find the BP monitor or it can't find new data in it. See images. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Hitesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: First item received from Amazon that let me down.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the box was opened and the manual was missing. So disappointed. I did not rate the product more stars because I couldn’t operate it properly from the get-go. I had to search for a manual online to properly use the product. I shouldn’t be paying full price for a product that’s been opened and missing an item.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Nice...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I have this. My doctor recommended this and this particular brand (she say it's the best to have). I use it almost every morning just to stay on top of my health.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase Platinum Model!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a waste of money. Giving 1 star but would give zero if available. Bluetooth connectivity is a word I’d terrible. Signal sent to iPhone 7 Plus does not recognize Ormon BP 5450. Spent over an hour trying to get it connected. When pairing for second user 2 days later, lost connection for 1st user. Now device is simply not discoverable. Product should be recalled and problem fixed and reported to Federal Trade Commission for false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: TXN-B&R

customer_reviews.title: Results all over the board
customer_reviews.text: Blood pressure results have a wide variance with multiple uses. We can take blood pressure 5 times in 15 minutes and the range is too great to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I also have a balance BP monitor and the bluetooth is much easier to setup and download. It took several attempts with the Omron and then it would not consistently sync up with my phone and I had to do a manual load. I do like the cuff on the Omron better. You also have to tell the app to add the reading. It works good. It is also larger than the balance.
customer_reviews.author: Ohanachan

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth won’t synch consistently
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth won’t stay connected and when it does, often won’t synch; it’s extremely frustrating and takes several attempts tinkering in different ways to get this function to work. Everything else about this automatic blood pressure cuff is acceptable. I’ve owned other OMRON non-Bluetooth devices and they always work well. It’s surprising and disappointing that they couldn’t get the Bluetooth feature right. OMRON really needs to fix this for its customers and for its reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not Bluetooth friendly.
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth option on this device did not work. The directions for setting up and syncing the device to a smartphone are vague and no specifics are provided identifying compatible smartphones or operating systems. My iPhone running iOS 13.4.1 would not recognize this device at all. This is not the first Omron device I have purchased over the years and been totally disappointed with. However, it is the last Omron device I will ever purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Nolan

customer_reviews.title: App and instructions worthless
customer_reviews.text: The app for this device is crap!! The machine will not pair with the app. The instructions were absolutely zero help when it says it will pair when you turn it on. This device will raise you blood pressure and not monitor it. Do yourself a favor and skip it
customer_reviews.author: Jason Holmberg

customer_reviews.title: Greatly needed
customer_reviews.text: This is the mother of all blood pressure monitors. I have bought and returned many of them that was not accurate. Even omron ones, this one is great. I have also tried wrist blood pressure monitors and no luck with them either. Consumer Reports says this one is the best one. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dale

customer_reviews.title: The company reviewed my documentation and said those are normal operating parameters.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad they told me by e-mail because I can't hear anything over the phone!I sent the company a video and db reading from my iPhone. They said they'd have their technicians review it. If anybody has any suggestions for quieting this thing down...
customer_reviews.author: DrPaul

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it takes 3 measurements on a set timer I want and average the result for an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: Angel from the Southeast

customer_reviews.title: Very Inconsistent and Inaccurate Results
customer_reviews.text: Regretfully, I have to submit this negative review as I had high hopes for the device. All I can tell you is that both my wife and I experienced very inconsistent results. I tested out the device thoroughly and the results were all over the place but particularly, they seemed to be roughly 10 points lower than what they should have been. I do have an issue with high blood and am used to taking my blood pressure. On the plus side, it was relatively easy to upload results to an Excel spreadsheet via csv file. I'm extremely disappointed and wish I could have written a positive review.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth transfer of data to phone feature is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: After taking the pressure readings, it seems to have a small window of time during which you need to read the data to your phone. If you miss this window of time, then you need to turn off the machine and press the bluetooth button and transfer data. Both methods have an unpredictable window during which the transfer has to be initiated from the app on phone. The phone app is very intrusive. I just needed the app to read the data and transfer it to Apple Health App but Omron App insists that I should create an online account where it seems to store a copy of data.
customer_reviews.author: sibi

customer_reviews.title: Quality BP Machine for home use. Recommend to all.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 70 with Cardio history. This is simply the best home machine I've owned. Easy to use, the provided case affords leaving it out in our living spaces. It has wifi data transfer capability (haven't figured that out yet, think it's a good thing)
customer_reviews.author: F. Tippett

customer_reviews.title: The Very Best!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best investment I’ve made in regards to my health! I’m a heart patient who needs to monitor daily and I need accurate readings! This Omron totally delivers! I’m SO pleased with my purchase! You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Bette Brown

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver...
customer_reviews.text: This model is amazing. I bought it to replace an older one. I get messages on my phone reminding me to take my BP! I paired it with my IPhone and have a daily record of my pressure. My cardiologist approves of its accuracy. A GREAT buy on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: A nice update to my old one
customer_reviews.text: A fellow patient recommended this platinum model. I never had a problem with my previous 10 year old OMRON, and this is a very nice updated one. I love the cuff, and the enclosed case. Very accurate readings that you can record on your phone app.
customer_reviews.author: Hourhanz

customer_reviews.title: Good consistent results
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of complaining about consistency. I make sure to read mine at the same time each morning and when I get home from work. I relax for a while in the chair I have it next to to make sure I'm relaxed and then take the reading. I use the 3 consecutive readings setting and it has been consistent with my doctors readings.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Paring
customer_reviews.text: Note to everyone who has purchased this BPM - to Bluetooth Pair and Transfer to App on smartphone - THE BPM HAS TO BE OFF! If On - these features do not work. Press the clock/pair button when BPM is Off to Pair - once paired prepare cuff on arm - turn BPM on to take BP. Once BP reading is done - or at any other time a BP reading is done - turn off - then press clock/pair to transfer readings to smartphone App. Yes it took me a while to figure this out - instructions are poor - website worst. More to come - let's see how consistently it works!
customer_reviews.author: les dileva

customer_reviews.title: disappointed in OMRON performance
customer_reviews.text: Its readings read very high; not accurate. Control of blood pressure a life saving issue for me at this point in life especially having kidney disease. My physician told me after we found in her office it read some 20 units higher than her calibrated office machine, to buy another new machine of different brand. So I have the new OMRON, do not use it. Then bought a similar blood pressure monitor a drugstore brand, at my doctors direction which works fine. I need to take my blood pressure daily. I am aware OMRON is rated very high, for me this purchase is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: roger w heymann

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: This is simple to use and easy to read. It is handy to have separate data saved for two users.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to use solo
customer_reviews.text: It is incredibly hard to take your own blood pressure and the machine doesn't make it easier. If it doesnt feel resistance within a short time frame it throws an error and deflates. Then you have to futz with the cuff and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Ok blood pressure machine, buy upon personal choice!
customer_reviews.text: The only two pros of this product are they ship in time and easy to use for home monitoring. But the reading is not accurate every time and the Bluetooth doesn't sync with the apps everytime even you are careful about it.
customer_reviews.author: MD J.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping Privacy
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and appears to be working properly. My problem is with the shipping from Amazon. The product arrived with just a shipping label attached to the Omron product box. The "Omron product box" should have been enclosed in a security/privacy envelope or box. The "Omron product box" also was not sealed...so it could have been opened by anyone during its transit to me. Not happy with this....hopefully Amazon reads this and makes some changes to their shipping policies.
customer_reviews.author: D. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Important tool to have for each household
customer_reviews.text: Great device to have around each household for tracking blood blessed, heartbeat levels. Very easy to use and readout are easy with large display digits. Has previous data tracking memory for 2 users. Options to use with wall plug or batteries. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Meh maybe not so great!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how accurate to be honest. Easy to use yes but not so easy to tell if readings have been transferred via Bluetooth to your phone! I went and had my BP checked by the physician and it seems to be much lower go figure?
customer_reviews.author: LordOlux

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a few days and brought it to the cardiologist's office. Two times it registered some much higher than their monitor, so I asked for them to recalibrate it and the response was, if this is new, should not be happening.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Clear and concise!
customer_reviews.text: Had no trouble using this and when I took in the data that had been transferred to my phone, it was totally accurate to my doctor’s readings!
customer_reviews.author: Helen T. Ricotta

product_meta.title: Omron Platinum Blood Pressure Monitor, Premium Upper Arm Cuff, Digital Bluetooth Blood Pressure Machine, Storesup To 200 Readings for Two Users (100 Readings Each)
product_meta.description: Style:Platinum (new version)The Omron Platinum Wireless upper arm blood pressure Monitor can be used with at least two users for blood pressure readings, and for detecting irregular heartbeats. It will store up to 200 Blood pressure readings (100 per user), but when used with the free Omron Connect app, it supports unlimited users and stores Unlimited blood pressure readings. Conveniently view your trend graphs and charts, and share as needed with your family, caregivers, or physicians. The Omron Connect app works with iOS and Android devices, as well as Amazon Alexa using the Omron Health skill.
feature_bullets: Trusted brand - Omron is the #1 recommended home blood pressure monitor brand by doctors and pharmacists for clinically-accurate home monitoring, and the #1 selling manufacturer of home blood pressure monitors for over 40 years.

Unlimited memory and users with the free app - The Omron gold wrist monitor stores 200 total blood pressure readings for 2 users (100 per user, most of any Omron wrist blood pressure monitor). Memory and users are unlimited with the Omron connect free app which works with amazon alexa-enabled devices (on select IOS & android devices).

High morning average indicator – Among Omron Amazon-exclusive blood pressure monitors, this feature is unique to the Gold and Platinum monitors. The indicator alerts the user if systolic or diastolic measurements are out of normal range in the morning, when there is a higher risk for heart attack or stroke.

Dual display with backlight - The Omron Platinum monitor features a backlit dual-display LCD monitor with easy navigation that allows the user to immediately compare the current reading to the previous reading. The backlight feature is only available with the Platinum Monitor.

AC adapter included - The Omron Ac Adapter eliminates the worry of changing batteries in your Omron Blood Pressure Monitor. The convenient AC adapter helps make sure your monitor is ready whenever you are.
Note - Blood pressure varies constantly due to many factors including stress, time of day, and how you wrap the cuff. These factors may affect your blood pressure.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
